mapper.sql: ) R1 ORDER BY RESVE_DE DESC, RESVE_TM DESC , BLD_CODE, BED_CODE LIMIT #{rowPerPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} OFFSET #{startRow, jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT RESVE_NO, RESVE_DE, DATE_FORMAT(RESVE_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RESVE_DE_TXT, RESVE_TM, BLD_CODE, MSSR_EMPNO, BED_CODE, RESVE_EMPNO, WAIT_EMPNO, REG_DT, UPDT_DT, CANCL_YN, COMPT_YN, SUCCS_YN, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = STS.RESVE_TM) AS RESVE_TM_TXT, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = STS.BLD_CODE) AS BLD_NM, (SELECT NCNM FROM MASSEUR WHERE EMPNO = STS.MSSR_EMPNO) AS MSSR_NCNM, (SELECT SEXDSTN FROM MASSEUR WHERE EMPNO = STS.MSSR_EMPNO) AS MSSR_SEXDSTN, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE = STS.BED_CODE AND CODE_TYS = STS.BLD_CODE) AS BED_NM, (SELECT HNAME FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV WHERE EMPNO = STS.RESVE_EMPNO) AS RESVE_EMPNM, (SELECT DEPTNM FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV WHERE EMPNO = STS.RESVE_EMPNO) AS RESVE_DEPTNM, (SELECT HNAME FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV WHERE EMPNO = STS.WAIT_EMPNO) AS WAIT_EMPNM, (SELECT DEPTNM FROM INF_PERSON_INFO_RCV WHERE EMPNO = STS.WAIT_EMPNO) AS WAIT_DEPTNM, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(REG_DT), '%m-%d %H:%i') FROM RESVE_HIST WHERE RESVE_NO = STS.RESVE_NO AND TARGET_EMPNO = STS.RESVE_EMPNO AND STTUS_CODE='STS01') AS RESVE_DT, (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(MAX(REG_DT), '%m-%d %H:%i') FROM RESVE_HIST WHERE RESVE_NO = STS.RESVE_NO AND TARGET_EMPNO = STS.WAIT_EMPNO AND STTUS_CODE='STS03') AS WAIT_DT FROM RESVE_STTUS STS WHERE RESVE_NO = #{resveNo}

SELECT RESVE_NO, STTUS_CODE_NM, DATE_FORMAT(T.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT_STR, CASE REG_EMPNO WHEN 'WAITCNCL' THEN '시스템' WHEN 'SYSTEM' THEN '시스템' ELSE HNAME END AS REG_EMPNM, STTUS_CODE, REG_EMPNO FROM ( SELECT HIST.RESVE_NO, STTUS_CODE, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM CMMN_CODE WHERE CODE_TYL='STS' AND CODE=HIST.STTUS_CODE) AS STTUS_CODE_NM, HIST.REG_EMPNO, HIST.REG_DT, PRSN.HNAME FROM RESVE_HIST HIST LEFT JOIN inf_person_info_rcv PRSN ON HIST.REG_EMPNO = PRSN.EMPNO WHERE RESVE_NO = #{resveNo} AND STTUS_CODE != 'STS00' ) T ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
